channel.title: Request for Vocalist
channel.description:
Recently, I've written a song and lyrics for it, and despite being able to sing, I lack a proper singing microphone and the voice for the song. However, I have recorded concept vocals and have the instrument track all set up. What I would like is for someone to sing - You have to have a powerful, raspy voice and the recording quality must be as good as the instrumental track. Post (or PM if you're THAT shy...) samples of your singing here and I'll PM you the track if I feel you suit the job.
Thanks,
~Lin

item.title: Request for Vocalist
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:3, topic:438900”][quote author=Daginith link=topic=541606.msg3967634#msg3967634 date=1333865201]
Since when are you musical…?

…good luck finding someone though.

[/quote]Since about 9 years and 2 albums ago.[/quote]
…what?

I gotta see this. Youtube links or something?

Read full topic
